For more information, please refer to ", "url": "https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/blob/master/LICENSE", "type": "", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/license", "tags": "$:/tags/License", "license-type": "Unlicense" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list": { "text": "{ "tiddlers": { <$list filter="""[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]butlast[]]""">"<$text text=<>/>": <$text text=<>/>, <$list filter="""[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]last[]]""">"<$text text=<>/>": <$text text=<>/> } }", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list", "list": "" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin": { "text": "{ "tiddlers": {} }", "version": "0.0.1", "type": "application/json", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin", "source": "", "plugin-type": "plugin", "list": "readme", "description": "Plugin Title", "dependents": "", "core-version": ">=5.1.14" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme": { "text": "\define my-svg() \end This plugin is an alternative to packaging a plugin using [[Node.js|http://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlyWiki%20on%20Node.js]] or the [[browser developer console|http://tiddlywiki.com/dev/#How%20to%20create%20plugins%20in%20the%20browser]]. Currently, variable transclusion, e.g. `$(name)$`, is not supported with the pack plugin button. A work around is to copy from $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list and paste it into the plugin template. This plugin adds the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars fill='#000' stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}} button to the View Toolbar and also the <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> tab to the Sidebar. The button becomes <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} when selected and then the tiddler appears in the list of tiddlers to be packed on the <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> tab. The list can be sorted using drag and drop. To drag an item, select it, then hold down the mouse or track-pad button while you drag it to a new location in the list. Release the button to drop the item into place. Unneeded plugin tiddlers can be removed from the list by using the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} button in the tiddler. The ''Pack Plugin'' button on the sidebar tab fills in the dependents field and opens in edit view. Set the plugin title, e.g. $:/plugins/yourname/pluginname, and also the following fields on the tiddler: |!Field |!Value | |''description'' |Plugin description | |''name'' |Plugin name (only needed for themes) | |''plugin-type'' |Either "plugin" for a regular plugin, "theme" for a theme, or "language" for a language pack | |''version'' |Set to the version number of the plugin (eg "0.0.1") | Additional fields https://tiddlywiki.com/#Plugin%20Fields Remove tiddlers by only selecting tiddlers you want in the plugin and hit ''Pack Plugin'' again. $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin is a plugin template. $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/libraryformat can be used to get library format. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Icon * Template * Stylesheet * Sidebar tab * Caption and hint", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar": { "text": "\define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]'/> \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]]'>
<$droppable actions=<>>
 
<$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field='title'/>
<$wikify name='a' text={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list}}> <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin' text=<> dependents={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list!!list}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-edit-tiddler' $param='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin'/> Pack Plugin {{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list||$:/copy}}", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "name": "", "list-before": "", "caption": "<$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/SideBar/Plugintools/Caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet": { "text": ".tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected { fill: {{!!tab-icon-selected-color}}; stroke: {{!!tab-icon-outline-color}}; } .tc-tab-buttons button:not(.tc-tab-selected) { fill: {{!!tab-icon-unselected-color}}; } .tc-plugintools { stroke: {{!!button-outline-color}}; stroke-width:3; fill: {{!!button-color}}; height:1em; width:1em; }", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "tab-icon-unselected-color": "#999", "tab-icon-selected-color": "#ff0", "tab-icon-outline-color": "#000", "caption": "Plugin Tools", "button-outline-color": "#000", "button-color": "#ff0" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/template": { "text": "\define add() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define my-svg() \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]is[current]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} m='116.8 5.9' path={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}> <> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}}/> <$list filter='[all[current]!list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}}/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/template", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/more-tiddler-actions", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Hint}}", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}}" } } }
title: $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools
